useCase.name: Perform Work Process
useCase.description: As a User, I want to perform a series of actions to complete a work process.

preconditions.precondition: All necessary information and resources are available.

successEndConditions.condition: The work process is successfully completed.

useCase.trigger: User initiates the work process by executing the DoWork action.

mainSequence.step: User requests to perform work by executing the DoWork action.
First Class creates a request to initiate the work process.
Second Class carries out the required work steps.
Last Class completes the work process successfully.
First Class confirms the successful completion and communicates it back to the User.
